Package com.bredventures.cardiop

Class CardiOpService

java.lang.Object
com.bredventures.cardiop.CardiOpService
public class CardiOpService extends Object
The CardiOp service is responsible for coordinating all the BLE network activity associated with the CardiOp network. This network allows clients with a CardiOp-enabled app to participate in your CardiOp fitness application.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardiOpService

      public CardiOpService()

  • Method Details

    • startService

      public static void startService(android.content.Context context, String name)
      Use this function to initialize the CardiOp service. Provide a Context for CardiOp to use.
      Parameters:
      context - The Context of your app necessary to access system bluetooth services
      name - This is the name that CardiOp will use to advertise by. Your device's Bluetooth will be renamed to this!

    • stopFramework

      public static void stopFramework()
      Call this when your app is paused, then startService again when app resumes.

    • setListener

      public static void setListener(CardiOpServiceListener listener)
      Call this with the delegate you wish to receive updates from CardiOp.
      Parameters:
      listener - Delegate which will receive CardiOp uppdates.

    • sendAllWorkoutStatus

      public static void sendAllWorkoutStatus(ClassSessionState started, int type, int location)
      Call this to update any connected CardiOp bluetooth clients.
      Parameters:
      started - Workout status
      type - Workout activity type (Integer corresponds to the Apple HKWorkoutActivityType enum)
      location - Workout activity indoor/outdoor: 1=Unknown, 2=Indoor, 3=Outdoor (Apple HKWorkoutSessionLocationType enum)

    • sendNewWorkoutStatus

      public static void sendNewWorkoutStatus(String userId, boolean started, int type, int location)
      Call this to update one particular CardiOp bluetooth client.
      Parameters:
      userId - User ID matching one provided via CardiOpServiceListener.didConnectNewUser(String userId)
      started - Workout status
      type - Workout activity type (Integer corresponds to the Apple HKWorkoutActivityType enum)
      location - Workout activity indoor/outdoor: 1=Unknown, 2=Indoor, 3=Outdoor (Apple HKWorkoutSessionLocationType enum)

    • setAdvertisedName

      public static void setAdvertisedName(String name)
      Call this when you wish to change the name provided via startService(Activity activity, String name)
      Parameters:
      name - New name for your device's Bluetooth identity

    • stopAdvertisingService

      public static void stopAdvertisingService()
      Call this when you wish to stop advertising but do not want to stop the CardiOp service.

    • resumeAdvertisingService

      public static void resumeAdvertisingService()
      Counterpart to stopAdvertisingService()

    • restartAdvertisement

      public static void restartAdvertisement()
      This method stops the advertising session and immediately starts a new one.

    • getAllClients

      public static ArrayList<String> getAllClients()
      Returns all currently connected clients
      Returns:
      A list of user IDs for all connected clients

    • isAdvertisingService

      public static boolean isAdvertisingService()
      Tells whenever your device is advertising CardiOp
      Returns:
      Boolean which is true when CardiOp is advertising
